Name: Curtain Call
Ingredients: 40 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered black olives.
Lightly MUDDLE basil (just to bruise) in base of shaker.
Add next 4 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Review: Rum, lemon, bitter liqueur and basil combine brilliantly with sparkling wine adding biscuity complexity, crispness and enlivening effervescence.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Arash Ghassemi at Green Door & Schwarze Traube, Berlin and originally made with Bacardi Carta Blanca rum , this was the German Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail.
